short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track product prices on Amazon.in, Flipkart, Snapdeal, Jabong, Infibeam, etc.. and save money!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PriceTrack.In assistant for chrome lets you track product prices on Indian shopping websites Amazon.in, Flipkart, Snapdeal, Jabong, Infibeam, etc.. and send you notifications when price reduces.
